extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (ENGL200 & ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).

basic.description: A study of the origins of the English novel from early modern prose romances and satires to the gothic novel. Emphasis falls on tracing the development of narrative forms and their relation to socio-cultural history.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Early Modern Prose Fiction
